backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with order, rider, user profile, and access-control data models plus storage mixins and maps used for managing delivery operations.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that converts old order and user data structures into an expanded new format with additional fields and updated statuses.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping feature IDs to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for implemented functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in routing, hooks, components, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode values, and applying base styles to elements and body.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, manifest, icons, and loading the main React application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest configuring app name, theme colors, start behavior, and icons for installable usage.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, fetch caching, and cache cleanup for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, authentication redirects, service worker registration, and role-based navigation across customer, rider, and admin areas.
frontend/src/areas/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Main admin layout that handles auth state, logout, and tab-based navigation between admin pages.
frontend/src/areas/admin/auth/AdminLogin: Login form for admin users with client-side validation and local session handling.
frontend/src/areas/admin/auth/useAdminAu: Custom hook providing simple localStorage-based admin authentication with 24-hour session persistence.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminCrea: Form for admins to create new delivery orders with validation and mutation to backend.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminDash: Dashboard showing order, rider, and earnings KPIs computed from fetched data.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminOrde: Order detail view enabling rider assignment, status updates, and viewing parcel/proof photos.
Lists admin orders with filtering, loading states, and navigation to create or view order details.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminRepo: Generates period-based order reports with CSV export and print support, displaying order metrics.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminRide: Manages riders including adding, editing location, and deleting, with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/areas/admin/pages/AdminSett: Allows updating company settings, uploading a logo, and managing delivery rate entries.
frontend/src/areas/customer/components/C: Renders a bottom navigation bar for customers to switch between booking, orders, and profile tabs.
frontend/src/areas/customer/CustomerShel: Provides the main customer layout with tab-based navigation among booking, orders, and profile pages.
frontend/src/areas/customer/pages/Custom: Form for customers to create delivery orders with optional parcel photo upload and success confirmation.
Displays detailed info for a customer's order, including status, addresses, photos, and a back button. Converts photo bytes to preview URLs and renders UI cards.
Shows the customer's list of orders with status badges and lets the user open an order detail view. Handles loading, empty state, and order selection.
Renders the customer's profile info, app install button, and logout action. Fetches user data and clears identity on logout.
frontend/src/areas/rider/components/Ride: Bottom navigation component for riders with tabs for orders and profile. Highlights active tab and triggers tab changes.
frontend/src/areas/rider/pages/RiderOrde: Shows detailed rider order info with pickup navigation, parcel/proof photos, and status update actions. Supports uploading proof photos and updating order status.
Lists rider-assigned orders with status badges and lets riders open detailed views. Handles loading, empty state, and order selection.
frontend/src/areas/rider/pages/RiderProf: Rider profile page showing user info, app install option, and logout. Clears user data and identity on sign-out.
frontend/src/areas/rider/RiderShell.tsx: Container that switches between rider orders and profile pages using a bottom navigation bar.
frontend/src/components/actions/WhatsApp: Displays a dialog showing a WhatsApp message with a button to copy it to the clipboard.
Creates a WhatsApp message for an order, opens WhatsApp, and shows a fallback dialog to copy the message if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied screen with options to go back or sign out, clearing user data and identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSurfac: Provides a full‑screen gradient container wrapper for app pages.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoCapt: Allows users to capture a photo with the camera or upload one, using a camera hook and dialog UI.
frontend/src/components/pwa/FloatingInst: Shows a floating button to trigger PWA installation when available.
frontend/src/components/pwa/InstallAppBu: Provides a full‑width button to install the PWA, showing loading state during installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Provides queries and mutations for managing orders, including fetching, updating status, assigning riders, and creating admin orders.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRiders.ts: Provides queries and mutations for managing riders, including fetching, adding, updating location, and client‑side deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSettings.ts: Manages admin settings and logo storage in localStorage, plus managing customizable rate entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user profile and admin status and offers a helper to clear cached user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider wrapping Dfinity AuthClient for loading, managing, and logging in with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Defines React Query hooks to create orders and fetch user or single order data via an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhotoUploads.ts: Offers mutations to upload parcel and proof photos and invalidates relevant order queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstallPrompt.t: Handles Android PWA install prompt events and exposes install button state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useRiderActions.ts: Provides a mutation for riders to update order status and refreshes related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, animations, gradients, and print rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity login and displays authentication state or errors.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: Profile setup form allowing users to submit name and role to create their profile.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker at /sw.js on page load if supported.
frontend/src/utils/adminKpis.ts: Utility functions computing order stats, active riders, and earnings for admin dashboards.
frontend/src/utils/deepLinks.ts: Generates WhatsApp and Google Maps URLs and provides a clipboard-copy helper.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Provides helpers to convert files to byte arrays, generate image URLs from bytes, and revoke created object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Generates order-based report statistics for various time periods and exports them to CSV.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, fonts, animations, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s PWA delivery app scope, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
